name: Greenland Adventures
description:
The clones have stolen your treasure! You must search their land and get all your treasure back! The enemies may seem scary, but you can use your magic attacks to stop them! Then, head for the goal (the Godot robot icon)!

PC Controls: Arrow Keys to move, and press space repeatedly to attack

Xbox Controller: D-Pad to move, and press A repeatedly to attack (same button mapping for other controllers)
